inclusion.criterion: men and women of any ethnic origin aged ≥18 years
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: 48 M with a h/o HTN hyperlipidemia, bicuspid aortic valve, and tobacco abuse

inclusion.criterion: V max across the aortic valve > 4m/s or Pmean ≥ 40mmHg and AVA ≤ 1cm2 or AVAi ≤ 0.6cm2/m2 at rest
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: TTE revealed severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function, EF was 25%

exclusion.criterion: Participation in another clinical trial within 30 days prior randomization
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Mental condition rendering the patient unable to understand the nature, scope and possible consequences of the study or to follow the protocol
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Positive stress-test defined as: Anginal chest pain during testing
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Left ventricular ejection fraction < 50% at rest
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient's EF is below the threshold for exclusion, but other factors suggest eligibility. STS score and symptoms are unknown.
